DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Agent Lowest Blood Concentration Outcome Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date a specimen was collected for a trough level (lowest blood level concentration of an agent) laboratory assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Agent Lowest Blood Concentration Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the results of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for the lowest blood concentration level of an agent, the smallest amount of an agent or substance present in a unit amount of peripheral blood.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.:Blood circulating throughout the body.:A measure of the amount of substance present in a unit amount of mixture, particularly, the amount of solute dissolved in a solvent. The amounts can be expressed as moles, masses, volumes, or parts.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
In the lowest position, nearest the ground, at the bottom; minimal in magnitude, lowest in rank or importance; an extreme state of adversity.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.

The quantity of a substance per unit volume or weight; a measure of the amount of substance present in a unit amount of mixture, particularly, the amount of solute dissolved in a solvent. The amounts can be expressed as moles, masses, volumes, or parts.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.origin: AMC CRF:AIDS Malignancy Consortium Case Report Form
